data.title: THUNDERBOLT AND LIGHTFOOT, Original Style D Vintage Clint Eastwood Movie Poster

data.text:
THUNDERBOLT AND LIGHTFOOT, 1974. Original 1 Sheet (27 x 41” / 69 x 104 cm) folded Style D Movie Poster starring Clint Eastwood as Thunderbolt and Jeff Bridges as Lightfoot; Directed by Michael Cimino. With the help of his tongue-in-cheek sidekick, a bank robber and his old gang reunite to organize a daring new heist.

This folded poster is in good original C8 condition with only minor conditional issues: color loss along fold lines in black ink, a large diagonal crease in bottom left corner and a 1-2″ fold separation at bottom center margin. Fortunately, these issues can be easily fixed with our Linen Backing process – remedying the above issues nearly invisible and producing a poster that’s ready to display! This service is an additional $80 upon request or by adding it to your cart below. For more information on linen backing please click here.

Condition C8. For Sale $195

On Sale $145

*Shipping Charges*

“Buy This Poster” button adds a $10 base charge for shipping a folded or rolled poster or $15 base charge for a Linen Backed Poster within the USA. If outside the USA, please select the appropriate surcharge to your cart. We use Priority Mail International

If you do not see your location please <CONTACT US> and we will provide a shipping quote. We combine shipping.

USA

A folded or rolled poster is $10 or $15 if Linen Backed.

CANADA

For Canada, the shipping surcharge is an additional $35 or $40 if Linen Backed.

UK/EUROPE

For UK/Europe, the shipping surcharge is an additional $50 or $55 if Linen Backed.

ASIA/AUSTRALASIA

For Asia/Australasia, the shipping surcharge is an additional $55 or $60 if Linen Backed.
